channel.title: Style on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog
channel.description: Recent content in Style on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog

item.title: A beautiful TREE SYMBOL from scratch in QGIS 3 with GEOMETRY GENERATOR
item.description: Draw some points in a layer and add this symbology to have a beautiful forest in your map.

item.title: Turn center-lines into BEAUTIFUL ROADS in QGIS 3
item.description: Transform them into beautifully styled polygons using only symbology and make your map beautiful
